languages.text: Трагическая смерть Идиры стала тяжелым ударом для Вигдис. На протяжении многих лет она отказывалась обсуждать ее гибель или их дружбу. Но, спустя много лет, когда Вигдис пришла пора оставить пост, сменила ее внучка Вигдис — Идира Сурри Отта из рода Толиман.
languages.translation_comment: квест идиры не сделан или в Q2 Идиры действовали насильно

languages.text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.
languages.original_text: Трагическая смерть Идиры стала тяжелым ударом для Вигдис. На протяжении многих лет она отказывалась обсуждать ее гибель или их дружбу. Но, спустя много лет, когда Вигдис пришла пора оставить пост, сменила ее внучка Вигдис — Идира Сурри Отта из рода Толиман.

traits.locale_text: Idira's tragic demise was a heavy blow for Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet when many years later it was time for Vigdis to resign, it was her granddaughter who took her place — Idira Surri Otta from the Toliman dynasty.

Idira's tragic demise was a heavy blow for Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet when many years later it was time for Vigdis to resign, it was her granddaughter who took her place — Idira Surri Otta from the Toliman dynasty.

Idira's tragic demise was a heavy blow for Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to resign, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

Idira's tragic demise was a heavy blow for Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to resign, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

languages.text: 伊迪拉的悲惨离世对维格迪斯而言是个沉重的打击。在接下来的许多年里，她都拒绝谈论伊迪拉的死亡，对她们的友谊也绝口不提。但是，多年之后，当维格迪斯宣布辞职的时候，她的孙女，托里曼王朝的伊迪拉·苏里·欧塔接替了她的位置。
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉的悲惨离世对维格迪斯而言是个沉重的打击。在接下来的许多年里，她都拒绝谈论伊迪拉的死亡，对她们的友谊也绝口不提。但是，多年之后，当维格迪斯宣布辞职的时候，她的孙女，托里曼王朝的伊迪拉·苏里·欧塔接替了她的位置。

languages.text: Idiras tragisches Ableben war ein schwerer Schlag für Vigdis. Viele Jahre lang weigerte sie sich, über ihren Tod oder ihre Freundschaft zu sprechen. Jahre später, als Vigdis in Rente ging, nahm aber ihre Enkelin Idira Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie ihren Platz ein.
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: Idiras tragisches Ableben war ein schwerer Schlag für Vigdis. Viele Jahre lang weigerte sie sich, über ihren Tod oder ihre Freundschaft zu sprechen. Jahre später, als Vigdis in Rente ging, nahm aber ihre Enkelin Idira Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie ihren Platz ein.

languages.text: Le décès d'Idira fut un terrible choc pour Vigdis. Elle refusa durant de longues années d'évoquer sa mort ainsi que leur amitié. Mais plusieurs décennies plus tard, quand il fut temps pour elle de se retirer, elle transmit son titre à sa petite-fille, Idira Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman.
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: Le décès d'Idira fut un terrible choc pour Vigdis. Elle refusa durant de longues années d'évoquer sa mort ainsi que leur amitié. Mais plusieurs décennies plus tard, quand il fut temps pour elle de se retirer, elle transmit son titre à sa petite-fille, Idira Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman.

languages.text: La trágica muerte de Idira supuso un golpe terrible para Vigdis. Durante muchos años se negó a hablar de su muerte y de su amistad. No obstante, muchos años después, cuando llegó la hora de que Vigdis abandonara su puesto, fue su nieta Idira Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman quien la sucedió en el cargo.
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: La trágica muerte de Idira supuso un golpe terrible para Vigdis. Durante muchos años se negó a hablar de su muerte y de su amistad. No obstante, muchos años después, cuando llegó la hora de que Vigdis abandonara su puesto, fue su nieta Idira Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman quien la sucedió en el cargo.

languages.text: イディラの悲劇的な死は、ヴィグディスにとって大きな痛手となった。長年にわたり、彼女はイディラの死や友情について口を開こうとしなかった。しかし長い時が経ち、一線を退く時が来ると、ヴィグディスは孫娘であるトリマン朝のイディラ・スール・アウタに跡を継がせた。
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: イディラの悲劇的な死は、ヴィグディスにとって大きな痛手となった。長年にわたり、彼女はイディラの死や友情について口を開こうとしなかった。しかし長い時が経ち、一線を退く時が来ると、ヴィグディスは孫娘であるトリマン朝のイディラ・スール・アウタに跡を継がせた。

languages.text: İdira'nın trajik ölümü Vigdis için ağır bir darbe oldu. Yıllar boyunca ne onun ölümü ne de aralarındaki arkadaşlık hakkında konuştu. Yıllar sonra, Vigdis'in emeklilik zamanı geldiğinde yerini, Toliman hanedanlığından torunu İdira Surri Otta aldı.
languages.original_text: Idira's tragic demise came as a heavy blow to Vigdis. For many years she refused to discuss her death or their friendship. Yet many years later, when it was time for Vigdis to retire, her granddaughter Idira Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty took her place.

traits.locale_text: İdira'nın trajik ölümü Vigdis için ağır bir darbe oldu. Yıllar boyunca ne onun ölümü ne de aralarındaki arkadaşlık hakkında konuştu. Yıllar sonra, Vigdis'in emeklilik zamanı geldiğinde yerini, Toliman hanedanlığından torunu İdira Surri Otta aldı.
